title: Sky Apple Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Western, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Bakery, English
description: Operating since 2002 with current ownership since 2010. Daytime is cafe menu, takeaway, and prepared foods for heat and serve at home. Dinner is restaurant menu. Vegan items are marked. Vegan cakes also available for advance order. Reservation suggested for evenings. Metro: Byker or Chillingham Road, or bus 16,18.
